name: Xaraya Brasil
short_description: Provide an accurate, high-quality and complete translation of Xaraya CMS (www.xaraya.com) to the Brazilian Portuguese language. Other localization works and related tools are welcome too. Xaraya sounds like: http://www.xaraya.com/xcommon/media/xaraya.wav
